mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (reply_id, comment_id, reply_content, member_email, reply_regdate) VALUES (reply_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{comment_id}, #{reply_content}, #{member_email}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.member_nickname FROM reply r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_email = m.member_email WHERE r.comment_id = #{comment_id}
